documents.document: Oof. @PeggySattlerNDP is straight up pretending that there was no error in the NDP platform when everyone (including her leader, @AndreaHorwath) has acknowledged a $1.4B math error. #onpoli #ldnont
Now @PeggySattlerNDP keeps saying "we've been very clear" as if she's been very clear (spoiler alert: she has not been clear). #onpoli #ldnont

In a local radio interview, @AndrewLawton claims he's in favour of equality and opportunity for all.
Funny, I'm pretty sure that's the exact opposite of almost everything he ever said as a talk radio host. #onpoli

When directly asked which of her candidates are cabinet material, @AndreaHorwath either can't or won't name a single one. When asked if @GurratanSingh is cabinet material, Horwath refuses to answer and moves on to another reporter.
She is clearly not proud of her team. #onpoli
